lines.text: Hey. What's that streaky blue missile thing that's heading towards us?
Hang on, I'll just check my data bank. Apparently it's a streaky blue missile thing and it's heading towards us. AWOOGA! AWOOGA!
He evolved from cats, sir, just as your distant ancestors once swung from trees.
Ancestors? His grandparents swung from trees.
How long have I been in stasis, Holly?
Well I couldn't let you out until the radiation died down to a safe level. Really, you're gonna laugh.

[in shock then pauses contemplatively]
My baseball cards must be worth a fortune!
It's like being at an Amish bachelor party.
[Kryten has asked where he might find the captain]
